Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Houston in 1967...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/2/1970, off Andy Messersmith (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1970, off Pedro Borbon Sr. (CHC)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1970, hitting .228 with 13 HR, 49 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/17/1973, hitting .409 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against San Francisco on 5/29/1978...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1978...
